title: [Neuroscience] Evidence of cognitive deficits in people who have recovered from COVID-19 has been discovered in a new study of over 80,000 individuals. Those who received mechanical ventilation to help them breathe whilst in hospital had the greatest impairment on cognitive tasks.
[Epidemiology] Two Different Antibody-Dependent Enhancement (ADE) Risks for SARS-CoV-2 Antibodies
